onboarding.welcome_subtitle: Create beautiful wishlists and make gifting delightful for everyone
onboarding.features_subtitle: Everything you need for perfect gift coordination
onboarding.feature1_subtitle: Create multiple wishlists for different occasions and add items with photos, prices, and links
onboarding.feature2_subtitle: Share your wishlists with friends and family. They can reserve items so there are no duplicate gifts
onboarding.feature3_subtitle: See what others want and coordinate gifts to avoid duplicates and surprise everyone
onboarding.account_subtitle: Create an account to unlock all features
onboarding.benefit_username_subtitle: Get a unique username others can find you by
onboarding.benefit_friends_subtitle: Share wishlists and coordinate gifts together
onboarding.account_reassurance: Don't worry! If you don't like the app, you can delete your account and all your data in 5 seconds from settings. No commitment required.
onboarding.signup_subtitle: Create an account to save your wishlists and sync across devices.
